THEVERYLOL30 ok its their fault for going outside and not wearing a mask or isnt vaccinated. gosh americans. and even if you arent american, you arent the only person with covid. i feel like society these days forget about other diseases far worse than covid-19.

hecker wheres your proof?... or that lie was proven false on the proof below. "that was the past" means you admit doing it.

hecker its still your fault if you didnt send it. your account, you responsibility.

hecker you literally admit it was legit by saying it was the past. damn. if you want to lie, do it properly. (for legal reasons, i am not encouraging you to lie.)

attributes.bio: drama.gg sucks but I guess here I am.
